name: chat-backend
description: Backend for a chat application allowing users to exchange messages.

resources.name: messages
resources.description: Chat messages exchanged between users in various conversations or rooms.

fields.name: senderId
fields.description: ID of the user who sent the message.

fields.name: chatRoomId
fields.description: ID of the chat room or conversation the message belongs to.

fields.name: content
fields.description: The actual text content of the message.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: Unix timestamp indicating when the message was sent.

resources.name: users
resources.description: User profiles participating in the chat application.

fields.name: email
fields.description: User's email address, used for authentication/identification.

fields.name: status
fields.description: Current online status of the user (e.g., 'online', 'offline', 'away').

fields.name: lastActive
fields.description: Unix timestamp of the user's last known activity.
